settings.title: monika agarwal
settings.main_information_text: It's a great place to buy stylish, gorgeous party wear with really helpful staff who guides you at every step. They also have an in house tailor who is really patient and gives you best advice. I just wish they have more trial rooms as the waiting time is really long especially on weekends
